'''Elemental Projectile Blasters''' are mechanisms that constantly emit propagating waves that deal Elemental DMG.

The waves may appear as a fiery line or a row of cubes, dealing Electro, Pyro, Hydro DMG.

When this mechanism becomes active, the top portion opens, the cube begins to rotate, and the blue parts of the mechanism glow yellow.

==Locations==
* Ruins in the [[Great Red Sand]]
